resources.string: Let me in, I am ready!
Gyro-SK8 is a mobile gaming experience aimed for hardcore players. Aim is to compete using your phone as a skateboard.
Choose your stance and start flipping the phone for points! Remember to use one hand only! No cheating!

By pressing start I understand and agree that playing is entirely at my own risk. Gyro-Sk8 shall in no event be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or exemplary damages or injuries

I understand and agree that playing Gyro-Sk8 application is entirely at my own risk. I understand and agree that the author of Gyro-Sk8 shall in no event be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or exemplary damages or injuries
